original_text: And when the seven thunders had sounded, I was about to write, but I heard a voice from heaven saying, “Seal up what the seven thunders have said, and do not write it down.”
korean_text: 일곱 우레가 말을 할 때에 내가 기록하려고 하다가 곧 들으니 하늘에서 소리가 나서 말하기를 일곱 우레가 말한 것을 인봉하고 기록하지 말라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And when the seven thunders had sounded
but I heard a voice from heaven
Seal up what the seven thunders have said
and do not write it down
